title: How to Make an Origami Box with Printer Paper

steps.title: Fold the paper from the top to the bottom, and line the edges up nicely.
steps.content: Fold the paper from the top to the bottom, and line the edges up nicely. Then make a crease.

steps.title: Fold the paper left to right, and make another crease.
steps.content: Fold the paper left to right, and make another crease.

steps.title: Bring only the corner of the very top piece of paper to the left so that you have a triangle on the top.
steps.content: Bring only the corner of the very top piece of paper to the left so that you have a triangle on the top. Make creases on the top edges of that triangle.

steps.title: Bring the right of the triangle flap to the left.
steps.content: Bring the right of the triangle flap to the left. Make the same triangle shape again with the top layer of the paper on the right.

steps.title: Bring the top left layer of that triangle to the right, and you should be left with an irregular pentagon shape.
steps.content: Bring the top left layer of that triangle to the right, and you should be left with an irregular pentagon shape.

steps.title: Take the top flap on the left and the top flap on the right, and fold them to the middle so that their edges meet.
steps.content: Take the top flap on the left and the top flap on the right, and fold them to the middle so that their edges meet. Then make a crease.

steps.title: Flip the whole thing over and repeat step 6.
steps.content: Flip the whole thing over and repeat step 6.

steps.title: Fold the two inner corners up to form a little triangle.
steps.content: Fold the two inner corners up to form a little triangle. Flip it over and repeat.

steps.title: Fold the whole top flap up like this.
steps.content: Fold the whole top flap up like this. Flip it over and repeat.

steps.title: Take the little triangles that we made and tuck them in the little pockets.
steps.content: Take the little triangles that we made and tuck them in the little pockets. Now flip it over and do the same thing.

steps.title: Open it.
steps.content: Open it. To do that, you have to pick it up from the bottom and open the box. You have to use your fingers to get the edges pushed back.
